item.title: Setting up a private maven mirror
item.description: What is a private Maven mirror? When you download dependencies with maven, you usually do it via maven central, and this might not be the best solution. Having a local copy of the maven repository is specially useful if you continually need to download dependencies: You avoid going through the internet, this can have a huge impact in the speed at you download dependencies. If you have a CI system that “starts from scratch” because it uses VM’s or containers on demand and always starts from a fresh filesystem, you will need to download dependencies every time.
